Luxurious, sustainable fragrances delivered through the most innovative nebulizing technology.

settings.title: Luxurious experiences. Created through fragrance. Driven by technology. Made for living.
AromaTech™ for Business
settings.text: Our fine-crafted fragrances help retail, luxury, and hospitality companies create meaningful, emotional connections with their customers.

settings.title: INCREASED SALES
settings.text: Pleasant fragrances are shown to support shopping up to 44% longer.

settings.title: A LASTING IMPRESSION
settings.text: Fragrances associate your brand with an emotional, sensory memory.

settings.title: PRODUCTIVITY BOOST
settings.text: Energizing scents help increase employee focus and elevate mood.
How scent marketing works to create specific responses in every customer.

settings.title: Your Brand, Your Fragrance
settings.text: It’s more than just diffusing a fragrance in a showroom or lobby — it’s the science of combining your brand identity, message, and the values of your target audience. We work with companies to examine their brand philosophies and objectives to identify a specific sensory message and target audience. After analyzing relevant data and research, we create a unique and custom brand fragrance.

settings.title: The Emotional Connection
settings.text: With over 1,00 odor receptors in our brains, we can easily identify over 10,000 individual scents. Scent marketing works to create specific responses in each consumer, imprinting a custom, pleasant-smelling scent formula directly into the consumer’s emotional center. Combined with other marketing techniques, fragrances significantly amplify a customer’s experience and create a distinct, memorable connection with your brand.

settings.title: Powerful,
settings.text: Using cold-air diffusion technology, our nebulizers preserve the integrity of our fragrance blends in the form of a dry micro-mist without the harsh undertones found in chemical-based scents. This ensures the natural properties of oils are maintained, providing a consistent fragrance throughout the entire diffusion process.

settings.title: Our story
settings.text: From the ingredients found in our Aroma Oils to the technology that drives our diffusers, we consider every element of our fragrance experience to ensure we’re staying true to our ethical and quality commitments.
We work with the world’s top luxury retail and hospitality companies to develop custom fragrances for their spaces.

settings.title: APPLE STORE
settings.text: We developed a custom fragrance for the launch of Apple’s new location at The Grove in Los Angeles. Combining the iconic company’s clean, streamlined aesthetic and welcoming atmosphere, we worked to develop a bright, inviting fragrance that energized their employees and excited customers.

settings.section_title: “This is a wonderful pull quote location. Perfect for setting the tone.”
settings.text:
- Dimitri Gailit
Founder, AromaTech

settings.title: Our Story
settings.text: AromaTech™ is a company dedicated to enhancing environments through fragrance innovation. Since 2009, we have been committed to providing the highest-quality fragrances for spaces using safe, sustainable ingredients delivered through the most powerful nebulizing technology available.

settings.title: Safe and Non-GMO

settings.title: Vegan and Cruelty-Free

settings.title: Sustainable
settings.text: ffffffffff

settings.title: Our Ingredients Philosophy
settings.text: In order to receive their full sensory benefits, we only use 100% pure essential oils in our fragrance blends and ensure they are sustainable, safe, and stable. Our Aroma Oils are free from parabens, sulfates, glycols, petrochemicals, synthetic colours, and other additives, and we’re compliant with all industry inhalation and diffusion rates to ensure your comfort and safety when diffusing at home.

settings.title: Our Innovative Technology
settings.text: Each of our fragrance nebulizers uses patented cold-air diffusion technology to release nanoparticles into the air that leave behind no residue. This technology preserves the integrity of our Aroma Oils to deliver pristine, evenly distributed fragrance without using heat or diluting the oils in water or alcohol.
